Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to extending provisions of law relating to the city of Middletown
Summary: Extends provisions of law relating to authorizing Middletown to sell delinquent liens to private parties.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 510 of the laws of 2013, authorizing the city of Middletown to enter into a contract to sell or pledge as collateral for a loan some or all of the delinquent liens held by such city to a private party or engage a private party to collect some or all of the delinquent tax liens held by it, in relation to the effectiveness thereof
